short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get background colors from the current tab.The cow grazes the colors.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly get the colors on a webpage with this extension. Rather than go inspect elements, get all the colors on a page immediately with just a click.

Current issue- Will get colors, but the extension is causing problems for using the ebay and amazon website.
